temporal_patterns: Higher fraud rates for same-day signup transactions
Weekend vs weekday variations in fraud rates
demographic_patterns: Age distribution differences between fraud and legitimate transactions
transaction_patterns: Purchase value distributions differ between fraud and legitimate
Browser and source-based fraud rate variations

data_quality.outliers: Present in purchase values, needs consideration in modeling

recommendations_for_modeling: Use SMOTE or other techniques to handle class imbalance
Create time-based features (hour, day, time since signup)
Consider geographical risk scores as features
